synopsis.text: Though she once lived a typical life as a high school student, Yuri Honjou is now trapped in a nightmarish realm of interconnected skyscrapers, with no ground in sight. In this twisted world, masked figures wield brutal force, indiscriminately killing all who cross their path. Upon realizing her brother is also trapped in this terrifying place, Yuri's resolve to survive is ignited. She vows to destroy this illogical world and the masked enemies that inhabit it. Alongside a reluctant ally, Mayuko Nise, Yuri embarks on a perilous journey to find her brother and escape. But as they navigate the treacherous landscape, they soon discover that the masked killers may not be the only threat they face. In this high-stakes survival story, Yuri must confront unimaginable horrors and find the strength to prevail against seemingly insurmountable odds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
